item.title: Can you Boggle Solve?
item.description: Boggle is a word game designed by Allan Turoff and originally distributed by Parker Brothers. The game is played using a plastic grid of lettered dice, in which players attempt to find words in sequences of adjacent letters… Wikipedia Problem Statement This problem is also said as Jigsaw Crossword Puzzle. You are given a board containing MxN cells, each letter containing an alphabet of the English language. The goal of the program is to traverse through different cells to find a given word such that the following conditions are satisfied.
